name: Journey (itch) (sidouw)
description:
Journey  Follow the journey T19 a cute little robot who suddenly woke up in an forest not knowing what was he nor why he was there so he set out to find out

__________________________________________

Bare that this a small project made in 15days by a team of three  armature dev

so it will have some bugs obviously sorry for any inconvenience

Gpu : GTX950

Cpu : i5 4th gen

 Ram :  8gb
